snippet: The multimedia artist Jessica Stockholder has turned a business-as-usual intersection in the Chicago Loop into a playful and imaginative realm.
abstract: Multimedia artist Jessica Stockholder turns a business-as-usual intersection in downtown Chicago into a playful and imaginative realm by wrapping four street corners in swaths of orange, green and turquoise in her latest work Color Jam.
lead_paragraph: The multimedia artist Jessica Stockholder has turned a business-as-usual intersection in the Chicago Loop into a playful and imaginative realm.

headline.seo: ‘Color Jam’ by Jessica Stockholder Opens in Chicago
headline.main: At a Busy Intersection, Going Beyond Red, Yellow and Green
headline.print_headline: At a Busy Intersection, Going Beyond Red, Yellow and Green
